role_definition: Oversee the use and assess the coverage and impact of advertising campaigns. Direct advertising campaign execution to maximize business impact. Oversee advertising campaign design and development activity.
example_of_use: Business development reviews market research to determine levels of awareness for selected bank products and initiates an advertising campaign to raise awareness
executive_summary: Develop the plan for and oversee advertising campaign activity, including budget and resource management
key_features: Direct the development of advertising campaigns
Direct the execution of advertising campaigns
